dict.string: User-facing description of why your app uses Bluetooth. Required for any app that uses Bluetooth and targets a minimum of iOS 12 or earlier.
User-facing description of why your app uses Bluetooth. Required for any app that targets iOS 13 or later.

array.string: Array that includes item “App communicates using Core Bluetooth” Required for any app that uses Bluetooth in background, including for scanning or even just maintaining a connection.
